title: MNA Asim Nazir presents Rs. 25 million cheque to PM for flood relief fund
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sept 7 (APP): Member National Assembly (MNA) Chaudhry Asim Nazir called on Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif here on Wednesday.
During the meeting, Chaudhry Asim Nazir presented Rs. 25 million cheque to the Prime Minister for Flood Relief Fund from Masood Textile Mills.
Meanwhile former Member Provincial Assembly (MPA) Hafiz Noman also called on the Prime Minister.
